post.text:
Join us right here on my Facebook page - for pre and post debate coverage! 

Coverage begins at 8:30pmE!

comment.author: Toni
comment.text: If you look at the amount of people who like DJT fb page compaired to Hillary and did a vote just on that alone trump would win by an incredible 11.5 million to 7.1 million people. Just look for yourselves

replies.author: Adam
replies.text: As a professional astrologer I have given a future prediction who will be the next US president? To see this future prediction go to YouTube and put Adam on it. Then you'll see an amazing future prediction about US presidential election.

replies.author: Toni
replies.text: Sorry I will stick to the facts .

replies.author: Elizabeth
replies.text: Lol the facts are that elections don't reflect the number of FB followers you have. You analysis is as irrelevant as your vote for Trump.

replies.author: Toni
replies.text: Hahaha! Why thank you kind sir! We will just have to see come election time.
